0.2: BuildBlocker array of 2 ints split to 2 properties *.x and *.z (so .csv dump of could be 1:1 to JSON)
ProductName, ProductGUID and ProductEng renamed to Production.Product.* (for naming consistency)
FarmField.* added + the farmfields themselves can be found in the buildings array by GUID (for farm size)
0.3: IconFileName changed, the second number corresponds to IconIndexdo without added +1 (for icons numbered from 0 instead from 1)
Production.Product.BaseGoldPrice added (in default trade price, not in datafile format)

_description: this is a list of Anno 2070 buildings with properties that help fan-made tools in there .. i tried to name the properties somewhat close to actual xml elements in game data files .. you can contact me on http://anno2070.wikia.com/wiki/User:DeathApril or peter.hozak@gmail.com
_missing_keys: not all objects use all the keys in this model, please check for KeyError exceptions before working with them (e.g. Production.RawNeeded2Material will be missing for factories with 1 input only)

buildings..ifo: text: path to .ifo of data2.rda data\graphics uildings, based on the first Object/Variations/Item/Filename for each asset
buildings.BuildBlocker.x: int: 'x' dimension of the building in tiles (right shift by 11 bits of the number found in BuildBlocker/x element in .ifo file
buildings.BuildBlocker.z: int: 'z' dimension of the building in tiles (right shift by 11 bits of the number found in BuildBlocker/z element in .ifo file
buildings.BuildCost.AdvancedWeapons: int: raw material needed to build in kilograms
buildings.BuildCost.BuildingModules: int: raw material needed to build in kilograms
buildings.BuildCost.Carbon: int: raw material needed to build in kilograms
buildings.BuildCost.Concrete: int: raw material needed to build in kilograms
buildings.BuildCost.Glass: int: raw material needed to build in kilograms
buildings.BuildCost.HeavyWeapons: int: raw material needed to build in kilograms
buildings.BuildCost.Steel: int: raw material needed to build in kilograms
buildings.BuildCost.Tools: int: raw material needed to build in kilograms
buildings.BuildCost.Weapons: int: raw material needed to build in kilograms
buildings.BuildCost.Wood: int: raw material needed to build in kilograms
buildings.Eng: text: english localisation labels from Eng.rda for building GUID
buildings.FarmField.BuildBlocker.x: int: copy of x dimension from the farmfield building BuildBlocker.x property (farms only)
buildings.FarmField.BuildBlocker.z: int: copy of x dimension from the farmfield building BuildBlocker.z property (farms only)
buildings.FarmField.Count: int: number of farmfields needed (farms only)
buildings.FarmField.Fertility: text: type of fertility needed on island (farms only)
buildings.FarmField.GUID: int: GUID of a farmfield (farms only)
buildings.GUID: int: GUID as appears in assets.xml and other files
buildings.Group: text: residence, public, production, special, ... (farms and factories are both production, see template)
buildings.IconFileName: text: filename from the folder http://odegroot.nl/anno2070/img/orig/icon/ (or see icon folder in the zip file from http://odegroot.nl/anno2070/all_icons.php (first number is IconFileID, the second is IconIndex)
buildings.IconWikiaFile: text: filename from the folder http://odegroot.nl/anno2070/img/orig/icon/ (or see icon folder in the zip file from http://odegroot.nl/anno2070/all_icons.php (first number is IconFileID, the second is IconIndex)
buildings.InfluenceRadius: int: radius from the center of the building in tiles
buildings.MaintenanceCost.ActiveCost: int: credits for maintsenance per tick
buildings.MaintenanceCost.InactiveCost: int: credits for maintenance of paused building per tick
buildings.MaintenanceCost.InactiveEcoEffect: float(+/-): eco effect of paused building (game unit)
buildings.MaintenanceCost.InactiveEnergyCost: float: energy consumption of paused building (game unit)
buildings.MaxResidentCount: int: max. number of inhabitants (houses only)
buildings.Name: text: base name that appears in data files
buildings.Production.Product.BaseGoldPrice: int: default trade price of product in credits [2.5 times the number from properties.xml //ProductPrices/*/BaseGoldPrice] (factories and farms only)
buildings.Production.Product.Eng: text: english localisation labels from latest Eng*.rda for product GUID (factories and farms only)
buildings.Production.Product.GUID: int: GUID of product (factories and farms only)
buildings.Production.Product.Name: text: name of product (factories and farms only)
buildings.Production.ProductionTonsPerMinute: float: tons per minute, calculated (factories and farms only)
buildings.Production.RawMaterial1: text: reference to Production.Product.Name of 1st supplier factory/farm (factories only)
buildings.Production.RawMaterial2: text: reference to Production.Product.Name of 2nd supplier factory/farm (factories only)
buildings.Production.RawNeeded1TonsPerMinute: float: tons per minute, calculated (factories only)
buildings.Production.RawNeeded2TonsPerMinute: float: tons per minute, calculated (factories only)
buildings.Unlock.IntermediateLevel: text: NeedsIntermediatelevel from assets.xml to pair the building to properties.xml's SortedLevels/IntermediateLevel
buildings.Unlock.ResidentCount: int: number of residents from properties.xml
buildings.Unlock.ResidentLevel: text: workers, employees, engineers or executives
